top_stories.title: Here’s how to save on a Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 preorder
top_stories.description: The forthcoming Galaxy Z Fold 7 is Samsung’s thinnest foldable yet. Our own Allison Johnson just published her full review ahead of the phone’s launch on July 25th, and while there’s certainly no denying it’s a spendy device, know that various carriers and retailers are offering a host of preorder incentives, many of which will […]

top_stories.title: NIST Ion Clock Sets New Record for Most Accurate Clock in the World
top_stories.description: This new result contributes to the international effort to define the second with a much greater level of accuracy than before, enabling new scientific and technological advances.
top_stories.author: Sarah Henderson
top_stories.content: This new result contributes to the international effort to define the second with a much greater level of accuracy than before, enabling new scientific and technological advances.

top_stories.title: OpenAI launches a general purpose agent in ChatGPT
top_stories.description: OpenAI announced the launch of ChatGPT agent, which the company claims to be its most capable AI agent product yet.
top_stories.author: Maxwell Zeff
top_stories.content: OpenAI announced the launch of ChatGPT agent, which the company claims to be its most capable AI agent product yet.

top_stories.title: Elastic Cloud Serverless now available on AWS in Frankfurt and Ohio
top_stories.description: We’re pleased to announce the availability of Elastic Cloud Serverless on AWS in the following regions: AWS Frankfurt (eu-central-1)AWS Ohio (us-east-2)Elastic Cloud Serverless provides the fastest way to start and scale observability, security, and search solutions without managing infrastructure. Built on the industry-first Search AI Lake architecture, it combines vast storage, separate storage and compute, low-latency querying, and advanced AI capabilities to deliver uncompromising speed and...
top_stories.author: Yuvraj Gupta,XingLu Wang,Brian Bergholm
top_stories.content: We’re pleased to announce the availability of Elastic Cloud Serverless on AWS in the following regions: AWS Frankfurt (eu-central-1)AWS Ohio (us-east-2)Elastic Cloud Serverless provides the fastest way to start and scale observability, security, and search solutions without managing infrastructure.
